original_text: Then I will remove my hand so that you will see my back. But nobody must ever see my face.’
korean_text: 손을 거두리니 네가 내 등을 볼 것이요 얼굴은 보지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: Then I will remove my hand
so that you will see my back
But nobody must ever see my face
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나의 얼굴은 결코 보지 못하리라
